attributes.action: Force westminster to represent us, not themselves
attributes.additional_details:
Urgently review the reasoning for Labour's refusal to allow Westminster to become England's parliament with MP's only elected from English constituencies and representatives from the devolved assemblies in the UK to attend only when UK matters are discussed.

Politicians MUST have the best interest of their electorate at heart, even if it lessens the chance of their party's future success.

rejection.details:
Please see below petition:

Petition Title: English parliament

Created by: June Williams

Closing: 30/03/2015
